papers.title: Cyber security and the Leviathan
papers.authors: Joseph Da Silva
papers.abstract: Dedicated cyber-security functions are common in commercial businesses, who are confronted by evolving and pervasive threats of data breaches and other perilous security events. Such businesses are enmeshed with the wider societies in which they operate. Using data gathered from in-depth, semi-structured interviews with 15 Chief Information Security Officers, as well as six senior organisational leaders, we show that the work of political philosopher Thomas Hobbes, particularly Leviathan, offers a useful lens through which to understand the context of these functions and of cyber security in Western society. Our findings indicate that cyber security within these businesses demonstrates a number of Hobbesian features that are further implicated in, and provide significant benefits to, the wider Leviathan-esque state. These include the normalisation of intrusive controls, such as surveillance, and the stimulation of consumption. We conclude by suggesting implications for cyber-security practitioners, in particular, the reflexivity that these perspectives offer, as well as for businesses and other researchers..
papers.abstract_zh: 专门的网络安全功能在商业企业中很常见，商业企业面临着数据泄露和其他危险安全事件的不断发展和普遍的威胁。这些企业与它们经营所在的更广泛的社会交织在一起。通过对15名首席信息安全官和6名高级组织领导人进行深入的半结构化采访，我们发现，政治哲学家托马斯·霍布斯(尤其是《利维坦》(Leviathan)的著作提供了一个有用的视角，有助于理解西方社会中这些职能和网络安全的背景。我们的研究结果表明，这些企业中的网络安全表现出许多霍布斯式的特征，这些特征进一步牵连到更广泛的利维坦式的国家，并为其带来重大利益。这些措施包括监控等干预性控制的正常化，以及刺激消费。最后，我们提出了对网络安全从业者的启示，特别是这些观点提供的反身性，以及对企业和其他研究人员的启示..
papers.title_zh: 网络安全和利维坦

papers.title: Editorial
papers.authors: Atif Ahmad, Sean B. Maynard, Richard L. Baskerville
papers.abstract: Recently, the agricultural sector is facing concomitant challenges of rising the productivity to feed the growing global population and increasing the resources use efficiency, while reducing the environmental impact on the ecosystems and human health. In fact, fertilizers and pesticides play a crucial role in agriculture, representing a powerful tool for growers to increase yield and guarantee continuous productivity throughout the seasons under both optimal and suboptimal conditions. In the last three decades, several technological innovations have been proposed to enhance the sustainability of agricultural production systems, through a significant reduction of synthetic agrochemicals like pesticides and fertilizers. A promising and environmental-friendly innovation would be the use of natural plant biostimulants (PBs) that enhance flowering, plant growth, fruit set, crop productivity, and nutrient use efficiency (NUE), and are able also to improve the tolerance against a wide range of abiotic stressors (Colla and Rouphael, 2015). PBs were initially defined by excluding some functionalities like fertilizers or plant protection products. In 1997, in Grounds Maintenance web-journal, Zhang and Schmidt from the Department of Crop and Soil Environmental Sciences of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, defined PBs as “materials that, in minute quantities, promote plant growth”. By using the statement “minute quantities” for describing PBs, the authors implicitly wanted to discriminate biostimulants from nutrients and soil amendments, which also promote plant growth, but are clearly applied in larger quantities. The PBs mentioned in this web article were two important categories such as humic acids and seaweed extracts, and their action on plants was proposed to be essentially hormonal. In 2012, the European Commission has assigned an ad hoc study on plant biostimulants to evaluate the substances and materials involved, which was published by du Jardin (2012) as: “The Science of Plant Biostimulants A bibliographic Analysis”. Based on the scientific literature (250 scientific articles using the term ‘biostimulant' in their titles and/or abstracts), the following definition was proposed: “Plant biostimulants are substances and materials, with the exception of nutrients and pesticides, which, when applied to plant, seeds or growing substrates in specific formulations, have the capacity to modify physiological processes of plants in a way that provides potential benefits to growth, development and/or stress responses”. du Jardin (2012) concluded that PBs are very heterogeneous materials, and proposed in his study eight categories of substances that acts as biostimulants: humic substances, complex organic materials (obtained from agro-industrial and urban waste products, sewage sludge extracts, composts, and manure), beneficial chemical elements (Al, Co, Na, Se, and Si), inorganic salts including phosphite, seaweed extracts (brown, red, and green
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，农业部门面临着提高生产力以养活不断增长的全球人口和提高资源利用效率的挑战，同时减少对生态系统和人类健康的环境影响。事实上，化肥和农药在农业中发挥着至关重要的作用，是种植者在最佳和次最佳条件下提高产量和保证全年连续生产的有力工具。在过去的三十年里，人们提出了一些技术创新，通过大量减少农药和化肥等合成农用化学品来提高农业生产系统的可持续性。一个有前途的环保创新是使用天然植物生物刺激素(PBs ),它可以促进开花、植物生长、坐果、作物产量和养分利用效率(NUE ),还能够提高对各种非生物胁迫的耐受性(Colla和Rouphael，2015年)。PBs最初的定义是排除一些功能，如肥料或植物保护产品。1997年，弗吉尼亚理工学院和州立大学作物与土壤环境科学系的张和施密特在《土壤维护》杂志上把PBs定义为“微量的促进植物生长的物质”。通过使用“微量”来描述PBs，作者含蓄地想要将生物刺激剂与营养物和土壤改良剂区分开来，后者也促进植物生长，但显然被大量使用。这篇网络文章中提到的PBs是两个重要的类别，如腐殖酸和海藻提取物，它们对植物的作用被认为基本上是激素。2012年，欧洲联盟委员会指定了一项关于植物生物刺激素的特别研究，以评估所涉及的物质和材料，该研究由du Jardin (2012年)出版，题为:"植物生物刺激素科学文献分析"。根据科学文献(250篇在其标题和/或摘要中使用“生物刺激剂”一词的科学文章)，提出了以下定义:“植物生物刺激剂是指除营养物和杀虫剂以外的物质和材料，当以特定配方应用于植物、种子或生长基质时，能够以一种对生长、发育和/或应激反应提供潜在益处的方式改变植物的生理过程”。du Jardin (2012年)得出结论认为，多溴联苯是一种非常异质的物质，并在他的研究中提出了八类作为生物刺激物的物质:腐殖物质、复杂的有机物质(从工农业和城市废物、污水污泥提取物、堆肥和粪肥中获得)、有益的化学元素(铝、钴、钠、硒和硅)、无机盐(包括亚磷酸盐)、海藻提取物(褐色、红色和绿色

papers.title: Topology-theoretic approach to address attribute linkage attacks in differential privacy
papers.authors: Jincheng Wang, Zhuohua Li, John C. S. Lui, Mingshen Sun
papers.abstract: Differential Privacy (DP) is well-known for its strong privacy guarantee. In this paper, we show that when there are correlations among attributes in the dataset, only relying on DP is not sufficient to defend against the "attribute linkage attack", which is a well-known privacy attack aiming at deducing participant’s attribute information. Our contributions are ① we show that the attribute linkage attack can be initiated with high probability even when data are protected under DP, ② we propose an enhanced DP standard called "APL-Free ϵ-DP", ③ by leveraging on topology theory, we design an algorithm "APLKiller" which satisfies this standard. Finally, experiments show that our algorithm not only eliminates the attribute linkage attack, but also achieves better data utility.
papers.abstract_zh: 差分隐私(DP)以其强大的隐私保证而闻名。本文指出，当数据集中的属性之间存在相关性时，仅依靠DP不足以抵御“属性关联攻击”，这是一种众所周知的旨在推断参与者属性信息的隐私攻击。我们的贡献在于:①我们证明了即使在数据保护下，属性链接攻击也有很大可能被发起；②我们提出了一个增强的数据保护标准，称为“无APL ϵ-dp”；③利用拓扑理论，我们设计了一个满足该标准的算法“APLKiller”。最后，实验表明，该算法不仅消除了属性关联攻击，而且获得了更好的数据效用。
papers.title_zh: 解决差分隐私中属性关联攻击的拓扑理论方法

papers.title: Behind the last line of defense: Surviving SoC faults and intrusions
papers.authors: Inês Pinto Gouveia, Marcus Völp, Paulo Esteves Veríssimo
papers.abstract: Today, leveraging the enormous modular power, diversity and flexibility of manycore systems-on-a-chip (SoCs) requires careful orchestration of complex resources, a task left to low-level software, e.g. hypervisors. In current architectures, this software forms a single point of failure and worthwhile target for attacks: once compromised, adversaries gain access to all information and full control over the platform and the environment it controls. This paper proposes Midir, an enhanced manycore architecture, effecting a paradigm shift from SoCs to distributed SoCs. Midir changes the way platform resources are controlled, by retrofitting tile-based fault containment through well known mechanisms, while securing low-overhead quorum-based consensus on all critical operations, in particular privilege management and, thus, management of containment domains. Allowing versatile redundancy management, Midir promotes resilience for all software levels, including at low level. We explain this architecture, its associated algorithms and hardware mechanisms and show, for the example of a Byzantine fault tolerant microhypervisor, that it outperforms the highly efficient MinBFT by one order of magnitude.
papers.title_zh: 最后一道防线的背后:抵御SoC故障和入侵
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，利用多核片上系统(SOC)的巨大模块化能力、多样性和灵活性，需要精心编排复杂的资源，这一任务留给了管理程序等低级软件。在当前的体系结构中，这种软件形成了单点故障和值得攻击的目标:一旦受到危害，对手就可以访问所有信息并完全控制它所控制的平台和环境。本文提出了一种增强的众核架构Midir，实现了从片上系统到分布式片上系统的范式转变。Midir改变了平台资源的控制方式，通过众所周知的机制改造基于tile的故障遏制，同时在所有关键操作上确保低开销的基于仲裁的共识，特别是权限管理，以及遏制域的管理。允许通用冗余管理，Midir提高了所有软件级别的弹性，包括低级别。我们解释了这种体系结构，它的相关算法和硬件机制，并以拜占庭容错微管理程序为例，说明它比高效的MinBFT高出一个数量级。

papers.title: Continuous auditing and threat detection in multi-cloud infrastructure
papers.authors: Kennedy A. Torkura, Muhammad I. H. Sukmana, Feng Cheng, Christoph Meinel
papers.abstract:
Efficient change control and configuration management is imperative for addressing the emerging
security threats in cloud infrastructure. These threats majorly exploit misconfiguration vulnerabilities
e.g. excessive permissions, disabled logging features and publicly accessible cloud storage buckets.
Traditional security tools and mechanisms are unable to effectively and continuously track changes in
cloud infrastructure owing to transience and unpredictability of cloud events. Therefore, novel tools
that are proactive, agile and continuous are imperative. This paper proposes CSBAuditor, a novel cloud
security system that continuously monitors cloud infrastructure, to detect malicious activities and
unauthorized changes. CSBAuditor leverages two concepts: state transition analysis and reconciler
pattern to overcome the aforementioned security issues. Furthermore, security metrics are used to
compute severity scores for detected vulnerabilities using a novel scoring system: Cloud Security
Scoring System. CSBAuditor has been evaluated using various strategies including security chaos
engineering fault injection strategies on Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Google Cloud Platform
(GCP). CSBAuditor effectively detects misconfigurations in real-time with a detection rate of over
98%. Also, the performance overhead is within acceptable limits.
papers.abstract_zh:
高效的变更控制和配置管理对于解决云基础架构中新出现的安全威胁至关重要。这些威胁主要利用错误配置漏洞，例如过度的权限、禁用的日志记录功能和可公开访问的云存储桶。由于云事件的短暂性和不可预测性，传统的安全工具和机制无法有效、持续地跟踪云基础架构中的变化。因此，主动、敏捷和持续的新型工具势在必行。本文提出了一种新型的云安全系统CSBAuditor，它可以持续监控云基础设施，以检测恶意活动和未经授权的更改。CSBAuditor利用两个概念:状态转换分析和协调器模式来克服上述安全问题。此外，安全指标还用于
计算检测到的漏洞的严重性分数，这是一个新颖的评分系统:云安全评分系统。已经使用各种策略对CSBAuditor进行了评估，包括亚马逊Web服务(AWS)和谷歌云平台(GCP)上的安全混乱
工程故障注入策略。CSBAuditor可以有效地实时检测错误配置，检测率超过98%。此外，性能开销在可接受的范围内。
papers.title_zh: 多云基础架构中的持续审计和威胁检测

papers.title: Cyber security in the age of COVID-19: A timeline and analysis of cyber-crime and cyber-attacks during the pandemic
papers.authors: Harjinder Singh Lallie, Lynsay A. Shepherd, Jason R. C. Nurse, Arnau Erola, Gregory Epiphaniou, Carsten Maple, Xavier J. A. Bellekens
papers.abstract: The entire world has been impacted by Covid-19, which has forced the nations to undergo lockdowns, which have opened the new horizons of virtual learning and work from home culture. Though virtual learning and online meetings were available prior to the lockdowns, use of these platforms have intensified. There is a lack of awareness among many in the public concerning the perils of using these platforms which makes them susceptible to cyber-crime attacks phishing, sexual or verbal abuse, eve teasing etc. Lockdowns have provided cyber criminals with new criminal opportunities and evidence shows that there has been a rampant increase in the number of cyber-crimes during this period. Public lack of awareness has led to innocent people falling prey in the hands of attackers. Since the pandemic and ensuing lockdowns came as a surprise, public and private authorities lacked the opportunity to make appropriate arrangements for training people and making these platforms secure. There is no question that if these platforms are made secure, then they will prove to be as an asset to the society but much work must be done to achieve the goal of complete cyber security.
papers.abstract_zh: 整个世界都受到了新冠肺炎的影响，这迫使各国进行封锁，这开启了虚拟学习和在家工作文化的新视野。尽管虚拟学习和在线会议在封锁之前就已经存在，但这些平台的使用已经加强。许多公众对使用这些平台的风险缺乏认识，这使得他们容易受到网络犯罪攻击、网络钓鱼、性虐待或言语虐待、eve戏弄等。封锁为网络罪犯提供了新的犯罪机会，有证据表明，在此期间，网络犯罪数量急剧增加。公众缺乏意识导致无辜的人成为袭击者手中的猎物。由于疫情和随后的封锁来得很突然，公共和私营部门没有机会做出适当的安排来培训人员和确保这些平台的安全。毫无疑问，如果这些平台变得安全，那么它们将被证明是社会的资产，但要实现完全网络安全的目标，还需要做很多工作。
papers.title_zh: 新冠肺炎时代的网络安全:疫情时期网络犯罪和网络攻击的时间表和分析

papers.title: Randpay: The technology for blockchain micropayments and transactions which require recipient's consent
papers.authors: Oleksii Konashevych, Oleg Khovayko
papers.abstract: Randpay is a technology developed in Emercoin for blockchain micropayments that can be more effective in some scenarios than the Lightning Network as we show in the paper. The protocol is based on the concept of Ronald L. Rivest and published in the paper "Electronic Lottery Tickets as Micropayments" (1997). The "lottery ticket" was designed for centralized systems where a trusted third party is required to provide payments, and in some scenarios is also a lottery facilitator. The existing blockchain protocol cannot accommodate peer-to-peer "lottery" micropayments at least without the need to create payment channels, which is analysed in the paper. Therefore, the implementation required the development of an update to the blockchain core. In the result, RandpayUTXO was introduced - infinitely spendable zero output that requires the payee's signature to be published in the blockchain. Randpay is considered to be the first blockchain protocol to require the payee to sign the transaction by their private key. This is a significant feature to improve not only microtransactions but also extend the use of the blockchain for legal deeds that require a payee's consent to be recognised in legal applications. The second important innovation of this research is the implementation of Blum's "coin flipping by telephone" problem to design a "lottery ticket" that does not require any third party to facilitate the lottery. The paper offers an API description, an analysis of the mathematical model, and proof of how "lottery" can be beneficial. There is also an attack analysis and overview of existing solutions.
papers.abstract_zh: Randpay是Emercoin为区块链小额支付开发的一项技术，在某些情况下，它比我们在论文中展示的闪电网络更有效。该协议基于罗纳德·L·李维斯特的概念，并发表在论文“作为小额支付的电子彩票”(1997)中。“彩票”是为集中式系统设计的，在这种系统中，需要一个可信的第三方来提供支付，在某些情况下，第三方也是彩票服务商。现有的区块链协议至少在不需要创建支付通道的情况下不能支持P2P“彩票”小额支付，本文对此进行了分析。因此，实施需要对区块链核心进行更新。结果，RandpayUTXO被引入——无限可消费的零产出，要求收款人的签名在区块链公布。Randpay被认为是第一个要求收款人使用其私钥签署交易的区块链协议。这是一个重要的功能，不仅可以改进微交易，还可以将区块链的使用扩展到需要收款人同意才能在法律申请中得到认可的法律契约。这项研究的第二个重要创新是实现了Blum的“电话抛硬币”问题，以设计一种不需要任何第三方来方便抽奖的“彩票”。本文提供了一个API描述，一个数学模型的分析，以及“彩票”如何有益的证明。还有攻击分析和现有解决方案概述。

papers.title: An omnidirectional approach to touch-based continuous authentication
papers.authors: Peter Aaby, Mario Valerio Giuffrida, William J. Buchanan, Zhiyuan Tan
papers.abstract: This paper focuses on how touch interactions on smartphones can provide a continuous user authentication service through behaviour captured by a touchscreen. While efforts are made to advance touch-based behavioural authentication, researchers often focus on gathering data, tuning classifiers, and enhancing performance by evaluating touch interactions in a sequence rather than independently. However, such systems only work by providing data representing distinct behavioural traits. The typical approach separates behaviour into touch directions and creates multiple user profiles. This work presents an omnidirectional approach which outperforms the traditional method independent of the touch direction - depending on optimal behavioural features and a balanced training set. Thus, we evaluate five behavioural feature sets using the conventional approach against our direction-agnostic method while testing several classifiers, including an Extra-Tree and Gradient Boosting Classifier, which is often overlooked. Results show that in comparison with the traditional, an Extra-Trees classifier and the proposed approach are superior when combining strokes. However, the performance depends on the applied feature set. We find that the TouchAlytics feature set outperforms others when using our approach when combining three or more strokes. Finally, we highlight the importance of reporting the mean area under the curve and equal error rate for single-stroke performance and varying the sequence of strokes separately.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文重点介绍智能手机上的触摸交互如何通过触摸屏捕捉的行为来提供持续的用户认证服务。虽然人们正在努力推进基于触摸的行为认证，但研究人员通常专注于收集数据、调整分类器，以及通过顺序而非独立地评估触摸交互来增强性能。然而，这种系统只能通过提供代表不同行为特征的数据来工作。典型的方法将行为分成触摸方向，并创建多个用户简档。这项工作提出了一种全方位的方法，优于传统的方法，独立于触摸方向-取决于最佳的行为特征和平衡的训练集。因此，我们在测试几个分类器(包括一个额外的树和梯度提升分类器，这是经常被忽略的)时，使用传统方法对我们的方向不可知方法评估了五个行为特征集。实验结果表明，与传统的笔画组合方法相比，额外树分类器和本文提出的方法具有更好的效果。但是，性能取决于应用的功能集。我们发现，当使用我们的方法组合三个或更多笔画时，TouchAlytics特征集优于其他特征集。最后，我们强调报告曲线下的平均面积和单冲程性能的等误差率以及分别改变冲程顺序的重要性。
papers.title_zh: 一种全方位的基于触摸的连续认证方法

papers.title: Towards practical differential privacy in data analysis: Understanding the effect of epsilon on utility in private ERM
papers.authors: Yuzhe Li, Yong Liu, Bo Li, Weiping Wang, Nan Liu
papers.abstract: In this paper, we focus our attention on private Empirical Risk Minimization (ERM), which is one of the most commonly used data analysis method. We take the first step towards solving the above problem by theoretically exploring the effect of epsilon (the parameter of differential privacy that determines the strength of privacy guarantee) on utility of the learning model. We trace the change of utility with modification of epsilon and reveal an established relationship between epsilon and utility. We then formalize this relationship and propose a practical approach for estimating the utility under an arbitrary value of epsilon. Both theoretical analysis and experimental results demonstrate high estimation accuracy and broad applicability of our approach in practical applications. As providing algorithms with strong utility guarantees that also give privacy when possible becomes more and more accepted, our approach would have high practical value and may be likely to be adopted by companies and organizations that would like to preserve privacy but are unwilling to compromise on utility.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们将注意力集中在私人经验风险最小化(ERM)上，这是最常用的数据分析方法之一。我们通过理论上探索ε(决定隐私保证强度的差分隐私的参数)对学习模型的效用的影响，朝着解决上述问题迈出了第一步。我们追踪了效用随ε的变化，揭示了ε和效用之间的关系。然后，我们将这种关系形式化，并提出一种实用的方法来估计任意ε值下的效用。理论分析和实验结果表明，该方法具有较高的估计精度和广泛的应用前景。随着越来越多的人接受提供具有强大效用保证的算法，并且在可能的情况下提供隐私，我们的方法将具有很高的实用价值，并且可能被希望保护隐私但不愿意在效用上妥协的公司和组织采用。
papers.title_zh: 走向数据分析中的实用差异隐私:理解epsilon对私有ERM中效用的影响

papers.title: A comparative risk analysis on CyberShip system with STPA-Sec, STRIDE and CORAS
papers.authors: Rishikesh Sahay, Daniel A. Sepulveda Estay, Weizhi Meng, Christian Damsgaard Jensen, Michael Bruhn Barfod
papers.abstract: The widespread use of software-intensive cyber systems in critical infrastructures such as ships (CyberShips) has brought huge benefits, yet it has also opened new avenues for cyber attacks to potentially disrupt operations. Cyber risk assessment plays a vital role in identifying cyber threats and vulnerabilities that can be exploited to compromise cyber systems. A number of methodologies have been proposed to carry out these analyses. This paper evaluates and compares the application of three risk assessment methodologies: system theoretic process analysis (STPA-Sec), STRIDE and CORAS for identifying threats and vulnerabilities in a CyberShip system. We specifically selected these three methodologies because they identify threats not only at the component level, but also threats or hazards caused due to the interaction between components, resulting in sets of threats identified with each methodology and relevant differences. Moreover, STPA-Sec which is a variant of the STPA is widely used for safety and security analysis of cyber physical systems (CPS); CORAS offers a framework to perform cyber risk assessment in a top-down approach that aligns with STPA-Sec; and STRIDE (Spoofing, Tampering, Repudiation, Information disclosure, Denial of Service, Elevation of Privilege) considers threat at the component level as well as during the interaction that is similar to STPA-Sec. As a result of this analysis, this paper highlights the pros and cons of these methodologies, illustrates areas of special applicability, and suggests that their complementary use as threats identified through STRIDE can be used as an input to CORAS and STPA-Sec to make these methods more structured.
papers.abstract_zh: 软件密集型网络系统在船舶(赛博舰)等关键基础设施中的广泛使用带来了巨大的好处，但也为网络攻击开辟了新的途径，有可能破坏运营。网络风险评估在识别可被用来危害网络系统的网络威胁和漏洞方面发挥着至关重要的作用。已经提出了许多方法来进行这些分析。本文评估和比较了三种风险评估方法的应用:系统理论过程分析(STPA-Sec)、STRIDE和CORAS，用于识别赛博舰系统中的威胁和漏洞。我们特别选择了这三种方法，因为它们不仅能识别组件级别的威胁，还能识别由于组件之间的相互作用而导致的威胁或危害，从而产生用每种方法识别的威胁集和相关差异。此外，STPA-Sec是STPA的变体，广泛用于网络物理系统(CPS)的安全和安保分析；CORAS提供了一个以自上而下的方式执行网络风险评估的框架，与STPA-Sec保持一致；STRIDE(欺骗、篡改、否认、信息泄露、拒绝服务、特权提升)在组件级别以及在类似于STPA-Sec的交互过程中考虑威胁。作为这一分析的结果，本文强调了这些方法的优缺点，说明了特别适用的领域，并建议将它们作为通过STRIDE识别的威胁的补充使用，可以作为对CORAS和STPA-Sec的输入，使这些方法更加结构化。
papers.title_zh: STPA-Sec、STRIDE和CORAS对赛博舰系统的比较风险分析

papers.title: Identifying and quantifying trade-offs in multi-stakeholder risk evaluation with applications to the data protection impact assessment of the GDPR
papers.authors: Majid Mollaeefar, Silvio Ranise
papers.abstract: Cybersecurity risk management consists of several steps including the selection of appropriate controls to minimize risks. This is a difficult task that requires to search through all possible subsets of a set of available controls and identify those that minimize the risks of all stakeholders. Since stakeholders may have different perceptions of the risks (especially when considering the impact of threats), conflicting goals may arise that require to find the best possible trade-offs among the various needs. In this work, we propose a quantitative and (semi)automated approach to solve this problem based on the well-known notion of Pareto optimality. For validation, we show how a prototype tool based on our approach can assist in the Data Protection Impact Assessment mandated by the General Data Protection Regulation on a simplified but realistic use case scenario. We also evaluate the scalability of the approach by conducting an experimental evaluation with the prototype with encouraging results.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络安全风险管理由几个步骤组成，包括选择适当的控制措施来最大限度地降低风险。这是一项艰巨的任务，需要搜索一组可用控制措施的所有可能子集，并确定那些将所有利益相关者的风险降至最低的控制措施。由于风险承担者可能对风险有不同的理解(尤其是在考虑威胁的影响时)，可能会出现相互冲突的目标，这需要在各种需求之间找到最佳的折衷方案。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个定量和(半)自动化的方法来解决这个问题的基础上，众所周知的帕累托最优的概念。为了验证，我们展示了一个基于我们方法的原型工具如何在一个简化但现实的用例场景中帮助进行一般数据保护法规要求的数据保护影响评估。我们还通过对原型进行实验评估来评估该方法的可扩展性，结果令人鼓舞。
papers.title_zh: 确定和量化多利益主体风险评估中的权衡，并应用于GDPR的数据保护影响评估

papers.title: Common vulnerability scoring system prediction based on open source intelligence information sources
papers.authors: Philipp Kühn, David N. Relke, Christian Reuter
papers.abstract: The number of newly published vulnerabilities is constantly increasing. Until now, the information available when a new vulnerability is published is manually assessed by experts using a Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) vector and score. This assessment is time consuming and requires expertise. Various works already try to predict CVSS vectors or scores using machine learning based on the textual descriptions of the vulnerability to enable faster assessment. However, for this purpose, previous works only use the texts available in databases such as National Vulnerability Database. With this work, the publicly available web pages referenced in the National Vulnerability Database are analyzed and made available as sources of texts through web scraping. A Deep Learning based method for predicting the CVSS vector is implemented and evaluated. The present work provides a classification of the National Vulnerability Database's reference texts based on the suitability and crawlability of their texts. While we identified the overall influence of the additional texts is negligible, we outperformed the state-of-the-art with our Deep Learning prediction models.
papers.title_zh: 基于开源情报信息源的常见漏洞评分系统预测
papers.abstract_zh: 新发布的漏洞数量不断增加。到目前为止，当新漏洞发布时，可用的信息是由专家使用通用漏洞评分系统(CVSS)向量和分数来手动评估的。这种评估非常耗时，并且需要专业知识。各种工作已经尝试使用基于漏洞的文本描述的机器学习来预测CVSS向量或分数，以实现更快的评估。然而，出于这一目的，以前的工作只使用数据库中可用的文本，如国家脆弱性数据库。通过这项工作，对国家脆弱性数据库中引用的公开网页进行了分析，并通过网络搜集使其成为可用的文本来源。实现并评估了用于预测CVSS向量的基于深度学习的方法。目前的工作提供了一个分类的国家脆弱性数据库的参考文本的基础上的适用性和爬行的文本。虽然我们确定额外文本的整体影响可以忽略不计，但我们的深度学习预测模型优于最先进的技术。

papers.title: Clustered federated learning architecture for network anomaly detection in large scale heterogeneous IoT networks
papers.authors: Xabier Sáez de Cámara, Jose Luis Flores, Cristóbal Arellano, Aitor Urbieta, Urko Zurutuza
papers.abstract: There is a growing trend of cyberattacks against Internet of Things (IoT) devices; moreover, the sophistication and motivation of those attacks is increasing. The vast scale of IoT, diverse hardware and software, and being typically placed in uncontrolled environments make traditional IT security mechanisms such as signature-based intrusion detection and prevention systems challenging to integrate. They also struggle to cope with the rapidly evolving IoT threat landscape due to long delays between the analysis and publication of the detection rules. Machine learning methods have shown faster response to emerging threats; however, model training architectures like cloud or edge computing face multiple drawbacks in IoT settings, including network overhead and data isolation arising from the large scale and heterogeneity that characterizes these networks. This work presents an architecture for training unsupervised models for network intrusion detection in large, distributed IoT and Industrial IoT (IIoT) deployments. We leverage Federated Learning (FL) to collaboratively train between peers and reduce isolation and network overhead problems. We build upon it to include an unsupervised device clustering algorithm fully integrated into the FL pipeline to address the heterogeneity issues that arise in FL settings. The architecture is implemented and evaluated using a testbed that includes various emulated IoT/IIoT devices and attackers interacting in a complex network topology comprising 100 emulated devices, 30 switches and 10 routers. The anomaly detection models are evaluated on real attacks performed by the testbed's threat actors, including the entire Mirai malware lifecycle, an additional botnet based on the Merlin command and control server and other red-teaming tools performing scanning activities and multiple attacks targeting the emulated devices.
papers.title_zh: 大规模异构物联网网络异常检测的集群联邦学习架构
papers.abstract_zh: 针对物联网(IoT)设备的网络攻击呈增长趋势；此外，这些攻击越来越复杂，动机也越来越强。物联网的巨大规模、多样化的硬件和软件以及通常处于不受控制的环境中，使得传统的IT安全机制(如基于签名的入侵检测和预防系统)难以集成。由于检测规则的分析和发布之间的长时间延迟，他们还难以应对快速发展的物联网威胁形势。机器学习方法对新出现的威胁表现出更快的反应；然而，像云和边缘计算这样的模型训练架构在物联网环境中面临着多种缺点，包括网络开销和数据隔离，这些网络的大规模和异构性是这些网络的特征。该工作提出了一种用于在大型分布式物联网和工业物联网(IIoT)部署中训练网络入侵检测的无监督模型的架构。我们利用联合学习(FL)在同伴之间进行协作训练，减少隔离和网络开销问题。我们在此基础上构建了一个完全集成到FL管道中的无监督设备聚类算法，以解决FL设置中出现的异构问题。使用测试床来实施和评估该架构，该测试床包括在复杂网络拓扑中交互的各种仿真物联网/物联网设备和攻击者，该复杂网络拓扑包括100个仿真设备、30个交换机和10个路由器。异常检测模型在测试床的威胁参与者执行的真实攻击上进行评估，包括整个Mirai未来组合恶意软件生命周期、基于Merlin command and control server的附加僵尸网络和其他执行扫描活动的红队工具，以及针对仿真设备的多个攻击。

papers.title: Design, implementation, and automation of a risk management approach for man-at-the-End software protection
papers.authors: Cataldo Basile, Bjorn De Sutter, Daniele Canavese, Leonardo Regano, Bart Coppens
papers.abstract: The last years have seen an increase in Man-at-the-End (MATE) attacks against software applications, both in number and severity. However, software protection, which aims at mitigating MATE attacks, is dominated by fuzzy concepts and security-through-obscurity. This paper presents a rationale for adopting and standardizing the protection of software as a risk management process according to the NIST SP800-39 approach. We examine the relevant constructs, models, and methods needed for formalizing and automating the activities in this process in the context of MATE software protection. We highlight the open issues that the research community still has to address. We discuss the benefits that such an approach can bring to all stakeholders. In addition, we present a Proof of Concept (PoC) decision support system that instantiates many of the discussed construct, models, and methods and automates many activities in the risk analysis methodology for the protection of software. Despite being a prototype, the PoC's validation with industry experts indicated that several aspects of the proposed risk management process can already be formalized and automated with our existing toolbox and that it can actually assist decision-making in industrially relevant settings.
papers.title_zh: 用于终端人员软件保护的风险管理方法的设计、实施和自动化
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去几年中，针对软件应用程序的终端人员(MATE)攻击在数量和严重性上都有所增加。然而，旨在减轻MATE攻击的软件保护被模糊的概念和模糊的安全性所支配。本文介绍了根据NIST SP800-39方法，将软件保护作为一个风险管理过程来采用和标准化的基本原理。我们研究了在MATE软件保护的背景下，形式化和自动化该过程中的活动所需的相关结构、模型和方法。我们强调了研究界仍然需要解决的公开问题。我们讨论这种方法可以给所有利益相关者带来的好处。此外，我们提出了一个概念验证(PoC)决策支持系统，它实例化了许多讨论过的结构、模型和方法，并自动化了软件保护风险分析方法中的许多活动。尽管是一个原型，PoC与行业专家的验证表明，提议的风险管理流程的几个方面已经可以用我们现有的工具箱正式化和自动化，并且它实际上可以在工业相关环境中帮助决策。

papers.title: Systematic analysis and comparison of security advice as datasets
papers.authors: Christopher Bellman, Paul C. van Oorschot
papers.abstract: A long list of documents have been offered as security advice, codes of practice, and security guidelines for building and using security products, including Internet of Things (IoT) devices. To date, little or no systematic analysis has been carried out on the advice datasets themselves. Contributing in this direction, we begin with an informal analysis of two documents offering advice related to IoT security—the ETSI Provisions and the UK DCMS Guidelines—and then carry out what we believe is the first systematic analysis of these advice datasets. Our analysis explains in what ways the ETSI Provisions are a positive evolution of the UK DCMS Guidelines. We also suggest aspects of security advice that might be given special attention by those offering security advice. measuring the quality of security advice, including characteristics beyond actionability. We encourage systematic assessment of other important elements of security advice documents and datasets. Our analysis suggests the following aspects be considered in creating security advice: target audiences, level of technical detail, references to external advice, granularity of advice items, and positioning. Our concluding thoughts on these follow.
papers.abstract_zh: 已经提供了一长串文档，作为构建和使用安全产品(包括物联网(IoT)设备)的安全建议、行为准则和安全指南。迄今为止，很少或没有对建议数据集本身进行系统分析。在这方面，我们首先对两份提供物联网安全相关建议的文件——ETSI条款和英国DCMS指南——进行了非正式分析，然后对这些建议数据集进行了我们认为是首次的系统分析。我们的分析解释了ETSI条款在哪些方面是英国DCMS准则的积极发展。我们还建议那些提供安全建议的人应该特别注意安全建议的一些方面。衡量安全建议的质量，包括可操作性以外的特征。我们鼓励对安全建议文档和数据集的其他重要元素进行系统评估。我们的分析建议在创建安全建议时考虑以下方面:目标受众、技术细节水平、对外部建议的引用、建议项的粒度以及定位。我们对这些问题的结论如下。
papers.title_zh: 作为数据集的安全建议的系统分析和比较

papers.title: When a RF beats a CNN and GRU, together - A comparison of deep learning and classical machine learning approaches for encrypted malware traffic classification
papers.authors: Adi Lichy, Ofek Bader, Ran Dubin, Amit Dvir, Chen Hajaj
papers.abstract: —Internet trafﬁc classiﬁcation is widely used to facilitate network management. It plays a crucial role in Quality of Services (QoS), Quality of Experience (QoE), network visibility, intrusion detection, and trafﬁc-trend anal-yses. While there is no theoretical guarantee that deep learning (DL)-based solutions perform better than classic machine learning (ML)-based ones, DL-based models have become the common default. This paper compares well-known DL-based and ML-based models and shows that in the case of malicious trafﬁc classiﬁcation, state-of-the-art DL-based solutions do not necessarily outperform the classical ML-based ones. We exemplify this ﬁnding using two well-known datasets for a varied set of tasks, such as: malware detection, malware family classiﬁcation, detection of zero-day attacks, and classiﬁcation of an iteratively growing dataset. Note that, it is not feasible to evaluate all possible models to make a concrete statement, thus, the above ﬁnding is not a recommendation to avoid DL-based models, but rather empirical proof that in some cases, there are more simplistic solutions, that may perform even better.
papers.abstract_zh: —互联网流量分类被广泛用于促进网络管理。它在服务质量(QoS)、体验质量(QoE)、网络可见性、入侵检测和流量趋势分析中发挥着至关重要的作用。虽然没有理论保证基于深度学习(DL)的解决方案比基于经典机器学习(ML)的解决方案性能更好，但基于DL的模型已经成为常见的默认模式。本文比较了众所周知的基于DL和基于ML的模型，并表明在恶意流量分类的情况下，基于DL的最新解决方案不一定优于基于ML的经典解决方案。我们使用两个众所周知的数据集来举例说明这一发现，这些数据集用于各种任务，例如:恶意软件检测、恶意软件家族分类、零日攻击检测以及迭代增长数据集的分类。请注意，评估所有可能的模型以做出具体陈述是不可行的，因此，上述发现并不是建议避免基于DL的模型，而是经验证明，在某些情况下，有更简单的解决方案，甚至可能表现得更好。

papers.title: Editorial
papers.authors: Atif Ahmad, Sean B. Maynard, Richard L. Baskerville
papers.abstract: Recently, the agricultural sector is facing concomitant challenges of rising the productivity to feed the growing global population and increasing the resources use efficiency, while reducing the environmental impact on the ecosystems and human health. In fact, fertilizers and pesticides play a crucial role in agriculture, representing a powerful tool for growers to increase yield and guarantee continuous productivity throughout the seasons under both optimal and suboptimal conditions. In the last three decades, several technological innovations have been proposed to enhance the sustainability of agricultural production systems, through a significant reduction of synthetic agrochemicals like pesticides and fertilizers. A promising and environmental-friendly innovation would be the use of natural plant biostimulants (PBs) that enhance flowering, plant growth, fruit set, crop productivity, and nutrient use efficiency (NUE), and are able also to improve the tolerance against a wide range of abiotic stressors (Colla and Rouphael, 2015). PBs were initially defined by excluding some functionalities like fertilizers or plant protection products. In 1997, in Grounds Maintenance web-journal, Zhang and Schmidt from the Department of Crop and Soil Environmental Sciences of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, defined PBs as “materials that, in minute quantities, promote plant growth”. By using the statement “minute quantities” for describing PBs, the authors implicitly wanted to discriminate biostimulants from nutrients and soil amendments, which also promote plant growth, but are clearly applied in larger quantities. The PBs mentioned in this web article were two important categories such as humic acids and seaweed extracts, and their action on plants was proposed to be essentially hormonal. In 2012, the European Commission has assigned an ad hoc study on plant biostimulants to evaluate the substances and materials involved, which was published by du Jardin (2012) as: “The Science of Plant Biostimulants A bibliographic Analysis”. Based on the scientific literature (250 scientific articles using the term ‘biostimulant' in their titles and/or abstracts), the following definition was proposed: “Plant biostimulants are substances and materials, with the exception of nutrients and pesticides, which, when applied to plant, seeds or growing substrates in specific formulations, have the capacity to modify physiological processes of plants in a way that provides potential benefits to growth, development and/or stress responses”. du Jardin (2012) concluded that PBs are very heterogeneous materials, and proposed in his study eight categories of substances that acts as biostimulants: humic substances, complex organic materials (obtained from agro-industrial and urban waste products, sewage sludge extracts, composts, and manure), beneficial chemical elements (Al, Co, Na, Se, and Si), inorganic salts including phosphite, seaweed extracts (brown, red, and green
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，农业部门面临着提高生产力以养活不断增长的全球人口和提高资源利用效率的挑战，同时减少对生态系统和人类健康的环境影响。事实上，化肥和农药在农业中发挥着至关重要的作用，是种植者在最佳和次最佳条件下提高产量和保证全年连续生产的有力工具。在过去的三十年里，人们提出了一些技术创新，通过大量减少农药和化肥等合成农用化学品来提高农业生产系统的可持续性。一个有前途的环保创新是使用天然植物生物刺激素(PBs ),它可以促进开花、植物生长、坐果、作物产量和养分利用效率(NUE ),还能够提高对各种非生物胁迫的耐受性(Colla和Rouphael，2015年)。PBs最初的定义是排除一些功能，如肥料或植物保护产品。1997年，弗吉尼亚理工学院和州立大学作物与土壤环境科学系的张和施密特在《土壤维护》杂志上把PBs定义为“微量的促进植物生长的物质”。通过使用“微量”来描述PBs，作者含蓄地想要将生物刺激剂与营养物和土壤改良剂区分开来，后者也促进植物生长，但显然被大量使用。这篇网络文章中提到的PBs是两个重要的类别，如腐殖酸和海藻提取物，它们对植物的作用被认为基本上是激素。2012年，欧洲联盟委员会指定了一项关于植物生物刺激素的特别研究，以评估所涉及的物质和材料，该研究由du Jardin (2012年)出版，题为:"植物生物刺激素科学文献分析"。根据科学文献(250篇在其标题和/或摘要中使用“生物刺激剂”一词的科学文章)，提出了以下定义:“植物生物刺激剂是指除营养物和杀虫剂以外的物质和材料，当以特定配方应用于植物、种子或生长基质时，能够以一种对生长、发育和/或应激反应提供潜在益处的方式改变植物的生理过程”。du Jardin (2012年)得出结论认为，多溴联苯是一种非常异质的物质，并在他的研究中提出了八类作为生物刺激物的物质:腐殖物质、复杂的有机物质(从工农业和城市废物、污水污泥提取物、堆肥和粪肥中获得)、有益的化学元素(铝、钴、钠、硒和硅)、无机盐(包括亚磷酸盐)、海藻提取物(褐色、红色和绿色

papers.title: Outsourcing scheme of ABE encryption secure against malicious adversary
papers.authors: Go Ohtake, Reihaneh Safavi-Naini, Liang Feng Zhang
papers.abstract: Integrated broadcast-broadband services allow viewers to simultaneously receive broadcast content over the airwaves and additional information related to the content over the Internet. This integration provides opportunities for new services to be tailored and offered to individual viewers. Viewing histories provide a rich variety of data for service providers to learn the preferences of individual viewers and fine-tune their offerings. Each person's viewing history, however, is privacy-sensitive data and may reveal information that the viewer does not want revealed. In this paper, we propose a system that allows viewers to specify a policy that they would like to be applied to their viewing history, when shared with service providers, by using attribute-based encryption (ABE). A ciphertext is associated with a policy, and it can be decrypted only by service providers who conform to the policy. To reduce the computations of the user terminal, we develop a system with provable security that allows the encryption to be outsourced to a cloud server, without the need to trust the cloud server. Although our solution is described for integrated broadcast-broadband services, the architecture and results could also be used for sharing viewing histories of services such as Netflix. We implemented our scheme and showed that it significantly reduces the computation cost of a user terminal.
papers.abstract_zh: 集成的广播-宽带服务允许观众通过无线电波同时接收广播内容，并通过互联网接收与该内容相关的附加信息。这种整合为定制新服务并提供给个人观众提供了机会。观看历史为服务提供商提供了丰富多样的数据，以了解各个观众的偏好并微调他们的服务。然而，每个人的观看历史是隐私敏感数据，可能会泄露观看者不想透露的信息。在本文中，我们提出了一个系统，允许观众通过使用基于属性的加密(ABE)来指定他们希望在与服务提供商共享时应用于他们的观看历史的策略。密文与策略相关联，并且只有符合策略的服务提供商才能解密密文。为了减少用户终端的计算量，我们开发了一个具有可证明安全性的系统，允许将加密外包给云服务器，而不需要信任云服务器。虽然我们的解决方案是针对集成广播-宽带服务描述的，但是该架构和结果也可以用于共享诸如网飞之类的服务的观看历史。我们实现了我们的方案，并且表明它显著地降低了用户终端的计算成本。

papers.title: Dual protocols for private multi-party matrix multiplication and trust computations
papers.authors: Jean-Guillaume Dumas, Pascal Lafourcade, Jean-Baptiste Orfila, Maxime Puys
papers.abstract:
This paper deals with distributed matrix multiplication. Each player owns only one row of both matrices and 
 
wishes to learn about one distinct row of the product matrix, without revealing its input to the other players. 
 
We first improve on a weighted average protocol, in order to securely compute a dot-product with a 
 
quadratic volume of communications and linear number of rounds. We also propose a protocol with five communication 
 
rounds, using a Paillier-like underlying homomorphic public key cryptosystem, which is secure in 
 
the semi-honest model or secure with high probability in the malicious adversary model. Using ProVerif, a 
 
cryptographic protocol verification tool, we are able to check the security of the protocol and provide a countermeasure 
 
for each attack found by the tool. We also give a randomization method to avoid collusion attacks. 
 
As an application, we show that this protocol enables a distributed and secure evaluation of trust relationships 
 
in a network, for a large class of trust evaluation schemes.
papers.abstract_zh:
本文研究分布式矩阵乘法。每个玩家只拥有矩阵和的一行

希望了解产品矩阵的一个独特行，而不将其输入透露给其他参与者。

我们首先改进了加权平均协议，以便安全地计算

二次通信量和线性回合数。我们还提出了一个具有五次通信协议

舍入，使用类似Paillier的基础同态公钥密码系统，该系统在

半诚实模型或恶意对手模型中的高概率安全。使用ProVerif，a

密码协议验证工具，我们能够检查协议的安全性并提供对策

对于该工具发现的每次攻击。我们还给出了一种避免共谋攻击的随机化方法。

作为一个应用，我们展示了该协议能够实现分布式和安全的信任关系评估

在网络中，对于一大类信任评估方案。
papers.title_zh: 私有多方矩阵乘法和信任计算的双重协议

papers.title: USB-based attacks
papers.authors: Nir Nissim, Ran Yahalom, Yuval Elovici
papers.abstract: A variety of USB-based attacks is being increased rapidly. Researchers manage to identify more and more threats and vulnerabilities, often with proof-of-concept practical demonstrations. USB-based vulnerabilities’ databases are being updated constantly. There are plenty of publications, including threat models and corresponding analysis, but attacks taxonomy is rarely being a goal of investigation. Furthermore, the great majority of such investigations and papers refers to cyberattacks in whole, in such cases USB-based attacks remain to be unreviewed. In this paper we aim to review current state of the USB-based attacks taxonomy studies. An attempt to summarize all well-known investigations and the additional material to create an enhanced taxonomy is represented.
papers.abstract_zh: 各种基于USB的攻击正在迅速增加。研究人员设法识别越来越多的威胁和漏洞，通常是通过概念验证实践演示。基于USB的漏洞数据库不断更新。有大量的出版物，包括威胁模型和相应的分析，但攻击分类很少成为调查的目标。此外，绝大多数此类调查和论文都涉及整个网络攻击，在这种情况下，基于USB的攻击仍有待审查。在本文中，我们旨在回顾基于USB的攻击分类研究的现状。试图总结所有众所周知的调查和额外的材料，以创建一个增强的分类法。
papers.title_zh: 基于USB的攻击
